title: (x) Flash Gordon - custom designed {Mike Y}
content: I need help IDing this one from Flash Gordon ![flash](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190251im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48637.jpg)
author: samiam

comments.content: I think the main title is hand-drawn. The ORIGINAL SOUNTRACK wording is Serif Gothic.
Thanks. Any sugguestions of a similar typeface?

I couldn't find an exact match, but here are some fonts you could use a a starting point.   
   
 [Signet Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190251/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/signet-modern/).   
   
Or [Anna](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190251/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-anna/).   
   
 [Bodega Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190251/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/bodega-sans/).

You might wanna check these out as well...   
   
 [http://www2.comicbookfonts.com/e/env/0001bG5V4P4fZGcH9c4f1X3/cartoon/catalog.html?link=/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190251/http:/www2.comicbookfonts.com/e/env/0001bG5V4P4fZGcH9c4f1X3/cartoon/catalog.html?link=/home.html)   
   
 [http://www.blambot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190251/http:/www.blambot.com/)

Yeah Dennis, maybe [The Story So Far](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190251/http:/www2.comicbookfonts.com/e/env/0001XY0dh5nSSVkt9A4C3a9/fonts/font_list.html?link=/fonts/DL/catalog.html&item=fonts:dl216) could be a starting point too.   
   
The thing is that that kind of A and S together in the same typeface are kind of hard to imagine and to find... but perfect for Flash I think.
